name: pnp-graph-connector-nodejs-javascript-IBMDB2
title: Ingest IBM DB2 sales data using JavaScript and Node.js
shortDescription: This sample contains a Copilot connector that shows how to bring IBM DB2 sales data located on the IBM Cloud to Microsoft 365. It gives you a very convenient way to search in Client Orders right from your tenant!
longDescription: This sample contains a Copilot connector that shows how to bring IBM DB2 sales data located on the IBM Cloud to Microsoft 365. It gives you a very convenient way to search in Client Orders right from your tenant!

thumbnails.alt: IBM DB2 sales information displayed in Microsoft Search results
